content:
There are some old broken entries in the docs search index:

  • Searching "entropy_def" links to https://teorth.github.io/pfr/docs/PFR/Entropy/Basic.html#ProbabilityTheory.entropy_def. The correct link is now https://teorth.github.io/pfr/docs/PFR/ForMathlib/Entropy/Basic.html#ProbabilityTheory.entropy_def.
  • Searching "entropy_neg" shows both "entropy_neg" and "ProbabilityTheory.entropy_neg". Only the latter is correct.

I wonder if this is some kind of CI caching issue?

EDIT: Caching .lake/build/doc/declarations seems suspicious; I'm building locally to investigate

EDIT 2: OK, .lake/build/doc/declarations/declaration-data-PFR* should not be cached, but the rest of the directory should be cached. This PR should fix it I think.
llllvvuu has marked this topic as resolved.
